titleStmt.title: The allegeance of the cleargie A sermon preached, at the meeting of the whole clergie of the dyocesse of Rochester, to take the Oath of allegeance to his most excellent Maiestie, at Greenewich, Nouem. 2 1610. By Samuel Page, Doctor in Diuinitie.
titleStmt.author: Page, Samuel, 1574-1630.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Nicholas Okes for Simon Waterson, dwelling in Paules Church-yard, at the signe of the Crowne,

notesStmt.note: Contains nine sermons. "The supper of the Lord", "The cape of good hope", and "The remedy of drought" each have separate dated title page; register and pagination are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
Lacks all but the first sermon, "The allegeance of the cleargie".

place.placeName: Paules Church-yard, at the signe of the Crowne
